name: Favonius Sword
desc: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!

values.desc: CRIT Hits have a <color=#99FFFFFF>60%</color> chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>12</color>s.

CRIT Hits have a <color=#99FFFFFF>70%</color> chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>10.5</color>s.

CRIT Hits have a <color=#99FFFFFF>80%</color> chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>9</color>s.

CRIT Hits have a <color=#99FFFFFF>90%</color> chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>7.5</color>s.

CRIT Hits have a <color=#99FFFFFF>100%</color> chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>6</color>s.
